adi1090x/dynamic-wallpaper

Bash script sets wallpapers based on time

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Wallpapers that change with the time of day
  • wallpaper app built with Material Design3, uses sources like Wallhaven, NASA APOD, Wikipedia picture of the day, supports multiple configs and scheduling
  • bash script profiler with per-command timing
  • convert wallpapers to any color scheme, pixel art, upscaling, and more
  • Cycles wallpapers with the sun
  • Generates wallpapers that shift with sun or time
  • Wallpaper collection with themes for desktop setups
  • Interactive wallpapers with web technologies for Windows
  • Live 4K wallpapers for macOS with SwiftUI and AWS Lambda
